response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that the product is valued at $15,000 to you. Considering this, I propose to sell it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This offer allows you to secure an item that matches your requirements while also providing you with a significant saving compared to its full value. I look forward to hearing your response.", "product_price": 12000}
